description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6m in depth, maximum height of 2.96m and eaves height of 2.85m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 2 (rainwater goods) - Officers have reviewed the information provided and are satisfied this can now be approved
The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Condition 2 (Rainwater Goods) of planning permission 19/01028/HOU is hereby approved.
The submitted plans refer to a rear outrigger roof extension, however the plans do not show a hip to gable front extension as descrived. Kindly clarify that this is the case or amend accordingly
